attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: give more incentives to young people to become active members of society, by paying them the full minimum wage at sixteen, scrapping tution fees, and encourage companys to employ trade apprentices.

rejection.details: The title of a petition must be a call to action, not your name. Also, this petition overlaps with several others on similar issues. Please consider signing those, rather than creating another.
reasons: Statements that don't actually request any action
Duplicate - this is similar to and/or overlaps with an existing petition or petitions
